categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A male individual served in the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire at some point during its reign. The individual was selected as a pilot for the Rogue Shadow, the ship used by "Starkiller," the secret apprentice of the Sith Lord Darth Vader. Sometime before or in 3 BBY, the pilot was shot in the back and killed by a Corellian gunrunner. The droid PROXY later told Juno Eclipse, a successor of the late pilot, about the individual's fate.
The pilot was briefly mentioned in The Force Unleashed novel, which was written by Sean Williams and released on August 19, 2008.
